title: UKRAINIAN VILLAGE TWO BR REHAB ON QUIET LEAFY BLOCK!
posting_body: Nicely rehabbed, five room two bedroom high garden (gets very good light, faces south, only three steps down) on quiet Ukrainian Village street.
Two blocks to Chicago Avenue (#66 bus runs all night), short walk to Metra train (5 minutes to Loop!), Smith Park, Mariano's, Tuman's, Star Lounge Cafe, Beetle, Empty Bottle, and much much more.
Both bedrooms fit queen beds comfortably (one fits a king bed!) and have good closets.
Brand new bathroom with great water pressure, brand new kitchen cabinets and countertops, microwave and dishwasher.
Extra room can be dining room or office.
Off street parking available, but street parking very easy too.
